comment.author: 24850040@N07
comment._content: If this is Valley Forge, that would be the Schuylkill River.  The Delaware is on the other side of Philadelphia.

comment.author: 26491575@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/kyletucker95] Thank you for noticing this oversight. The description will be corrected to indicate Schuylkill River.
